Model.Cards.MessageCards

Class MessageCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.Cards.Card
      • Model.Cards.MessageCards.MessageCard
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdvertisementCard, BillCard, CharityCard, MadCard, MoveToDealerBuyerCard, PayNeighborCard

    public abstract class MessageCard
extends Card
    Abstract class that will be used for implementing every type of Message Card
